name: ROYGBIV (TONY WETZKE)
description:
• The application is a low entry to make music. By clicking at the fields within the grid, it creates islands. 
  • You can pick different colours to spawn a couple of various settings. The wave constantly moves from one side to the other. The islands make sounds if they being hit by the wave.
  • LEFT CLICK: Spawn islands on the grid
  • DOUBLE LEFT CLICK: Remove island
  • HOLD LEFT CLICK: Paint tool to pick other colours
SOCIAL:

  

This project is the result of my university semester. The topic was the number 7. I used Unity / Blender / Ableton.
